document.docAuthor: Marsh, Paul M., Wild, Alexander L. & Whitfield, James B.
document.masterDocTitle: The Doryctinae (Braconidae) of Costa Rica: genera and species of the tribe Heterospilini

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The Doryctinae (Braconidae) of Costa Rica: genera and species of the tribe Heterospilini

subSubSection.paragraph: Heterospilus nueve Marsh sp. n. Figure 263

Top label (white, printed) - COSTA RICA-Heredia Prov. [;] La Selva Biological Station [;] 10°26'N , 84°01'W , 100m [;] Canopy fogging 37 [;] 15.xi.1994 [;] Project ALAS (FVK37); second label (red, partially printed and hand written) - HOLOTYPE [;] Heterospilus [;] nueve [;] P. Marsh. Deposited in ESUW.

1 ♀, COSTA RICA, Limon [;] sur de Iriquois [;] 300m, 23/V/1987 [;] Col. Paul Hanson (MICR). 1 ♀, top label - COSTA RICA, Heredia: [;] Est. Biol. La Selva, 50- [;] 150m, 10°26'N , 84°01'W [;] Aug 1998, INBio-OET; second label - 06 Agosto 1998 [;] Borde suampo [;] M/18/714 (INBC).
The absent posterior transverse groove of metasomal tergum 3, the distinct median basal carina of the propodeum and the brown flagellum are distinctive for this species.
The specific name is an arbitrary combination of letters.

caption.paragraph: Figure 263. Heterospilus nueve Marsh, sp. n., holotype.
